body_html:
Thanks @benoitsteiner. It would be nice to actually have support for float16 in actual matrix operations and kernels. See for example: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_blas.cc#L1683
Right now it actually converts float16 to float32 instead of using Hgemm. This a different issue though.
